summary.span: 生成一个临时代码文件，其中包含指定的生成代码片段。

span.span: Generates a temporary code file with the specified generated code fragment.

span.span: Creates a temporary code file with the specified generated code fragment.

summary.span: 获取或设置要写入的特性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes to write.

value.span: 一个项, 其值为属性的完整类型名称。

span.span: An item whose value is the full type name of the attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个元数据是参数的名称-值对, 参数的类型必须为 System.string。Each piece of metadata is the name-value pair of a parameter, which must be of type System.String. 某些属性仅允许位置构造函数参数, 或用户可能只是使用它们。Some attributes only allow positional constructor arguments, or the user may just prefer them. 若要设置这些名称, 请使用元数据名称, 如 "_Parameter1"、"_Parameter2" 等。如果跳过参数索引, 则是错误的。To set those, use metadata names like "_Parameter1", "_Parameter2" etc. If a parameter index is skipped, it's an error.

summary.span: 获取或设置要生成的代码的语言。

span.span: Gets or sets the language of code to generate.
The language of code to generate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 语言名称可以是任何可用的 CodeDom 提供程序的语言。Language name can be any language for which a CodeDom provider is available. 例如, "C#"、""。For example, "C#", "VisualBasic". 向发出的文件提供该语言的默认扩展名。The file emitted is given the default extension for that language.

summary.span: 获取或设置生成的代码的目标文件夹（通常为中间文件夹）。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination folder for the generated code, typically the intermediate folder.

value.span: 所生成代码的目标文件夹。

span.span: The destination folder for the generated code.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置已生成的文件的路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the path to the file that was generated.
The path to the file that was generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果将此属性设置为文件名, 则会在其中预置目标文件夹。If setting this property with a file name, the destination folder will be prepended. 如果使用根值设置此属性, 则将忽略目标文件夹。If setting this property with a rooted value, the destination folder will be ignored. 如果未设置此属性, WriteCodeFragment 将使用目标文件夹、任意文件名以及所选语言的默认扩展名。If this property is not set, WriteCodeFragment uses the destination folder, an arbitrary file name, and the default extension for the language selected.
